turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order four medium-sized pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would ham, pineapple, and cheese on the first one. I would some chicken barbecue sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and jalapeños on the second one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Green peppers on the third one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like some meatballs and pepperoni on the fourth one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra cheese, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me repeat your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 medium pizzas with extra cheese, 1 ham and pineapple, 1 chicken bbq with jalapenos, 1 broccoli and green peppers, and one meatball and pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you. No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
